mapper.select: SELECT a.tdttSeq ,a.tdttShowTime ,a.tdttMorningNy ,b.tdthBranch ,c.tdpxPlexName ,c.tdpxTotalSeatNum ,d.tdmvMovieTitle FROM tradTimeTable a JOIN tradTheater b on b.tdthSeq = a.tradTheater_tdthSeq JOIN tradTheaterPlex c on c.tdpxSeq = a.tradTheaterPlex_tdpxSeq JOIN tradMovie d on d.tdmvSeq = a.tradMovie_tdmvSeq WHERE a.tdttSeq = #{tdttSeq}

SELECT b.tdthBranch ,c.tdpxPlexName ,a.tdttShowTime ,d.tdmvMovieTitle ,c.tdpxTotalSeatNum ,a.tdttMorningNy FROM tradTimeTable a JOIN tradTheater b on b.tdthSeq = a.tradTheater_tdthSeq JOIN tradTheaterPlex c on c.tdpxSeq = a.tradTheaterPlex_tdpxSeq JOIN tradMovie d on d.tdmvSeq = a.tradMovie_tdmvSeq WHERE 1=1 and a.tradMovie_tdmvSeq = #{tdmvSeq} and b.tdthSeq = #{tdthSeq}
select b.tdthRegion ,b.tdthBranch ,b.tdthSeq from tradTimeTable a join tradTheater b on b.tdthSeq = a.tradTheater_tdthSeq where a.tradMovie_tdmvSeq = #{tdmvSeq} group by b.tdthBranch
